mapper.select: select no, title, skill, bonus, cover from card where title like '%' || #{title} || '%' order by no desc
select title, content, skill, bonus, cover from (select no, title, content, skill, bonus, cover from card order by dbms_random.value) where rownum = 1
mapper.update: UPDATE "CARD" SET TITLE = #{title}, CONTENT = #{content}, SKILL = #{skill}, BONUS = #{bonus}, COVER = #{cover} WHERE NO = #{no}
